revision.text:
{{Infobox battle item |name = Shard Plates |image = [[File:Mine_Draco_Plate.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Draco Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] }} ==Description== '''Shard Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then either be sold for 100 [[Shards]] of their respective type, or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day. ===Types=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" ! '''Type'''
''Name'' !! Image |- | '''Fire'''
''Flame Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Flame_Plate.png]] |- | '''Water'''
''Splash Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Splash_Plate.png]] |- | '''Electric'''
''Zap Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Zap_Plate.png]] |- | '''Grass'''
''Meadow Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Meadow_Plate.png]] |- | '''Ice'''
''Icicle Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Icicle_Plate.png]] |- | '''Fighting'''
''Fist Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Fist_Plate.png]] |- | '''Poison'''
''Toxic Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Toxic_Plate.png]] |- | '''Ground'''
''Earth Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Earth_Plate.png]] |- | '''Flying'''
''Sky Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Sky_Plate.png]] |- | '''Psychic'''
''Mind Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Mind_Plate.png]] |- | '''Bug'''
''Insect Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Insect_Plate.png]] |- | '''Rock'''
''Stone Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Stone_Plate.png]] |- | '''Ghost'''
''Spooky Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Spooky_Plate.png]] |- | '''Dragon'''
''Draco Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Draco_Plate.png]] |- | '''Dark'''
''Dread Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Dread_Plate.png]] |- | '''Steel'''
''Iron Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Iron_Plate.png]] |- | '''Fairy'''
''Pixie Plate'' || [[File:Mine_Pixie_Plate.png]] |} [[Category:Items]]
